title: Build XYZ Dental Clinic premium website with animations and admin panel

requirements.text: Implement scroll-triggered reveal animations (fade-in and slide-up effects) for text and images throughout the website using Framer Motion or similar React animation library
acceptanceCriteria: Text elements fade in smoothly when scrolling into view
Images slide up with fade effect when entering viewport
Animations trigger once per element on first scroll

requirements.text: Add parallax scrolling effect to background images creating depth perception as users scroll
acceptanceCriteria: Background images move slower than foreground content
Parallax effect is smooth without janky performance
Effect works on hero section and key image sections

requirements.text: Create micro-interactions for buttons with hover effects including smooth glow and scale-up animations
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons scale up slightly on hover (1.05x)
Glow effect appears smoothly on hover
Transitions are smooth and professional

requirements.text: Integrate Lottie animations for dental procedures (cleaning, implants) that sync with accompanying text descriptions
acceptanceCriteria: Lottie animations load and play for dental procedures
Animations sync with text scroll position or trigger
Animations are lightweight and don't impact performance

requirements.text: Create hero section with high-quality image slider or static hero image featuring dental work with prominent 'Book Appointment' call-to-action button
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays full-width with professional dental imagery
Book Appointment button is prominent and easily clickable
Hero includes heading about perfect smiles
Responsive layout works on mobile and desktop

requirements.text: Build interactive before/after slider component where users can drag to compare treatment results with left showing before and right showing after
acceptanceCriteria: Slider handle can be dragged horizontally
Left side shows before image, right side shows after image
Smooth dragging experience without lag
Mobile touch support for dragging

requirements.text: Create services grid displaying dental services (Root Canal, Braces, Whitening, etc.) with animated icons and links to detail pages for each service
acceptanceCriteria: Grid layout displays multiple services in organized manner
Each service has an animated icon
Clicking a service navigates to its detail page
Icons animate on hover or scroll into view

requirements.text: Build doctor profile section with photo, smooth entry animation, and details including expertise and education credentials
acceptanceCriteria: Doctor photo displays prominently
Section animates smoothly when scrolling into view
Expertise and education information is clearly displayed
Professional and trustworthy layout

requirements.text: Create auto-sliding testimonial carousel section for patient reviews with manual navigation controls
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials auto-slide every few seconds
Users can manually navigate between reviews
Smooth transitions between testimonials
Displays patient name and review text clearly

requirements.text: Add live contact features including WhatsApp chat button, embedded Google Maps location, and clickable phone number
acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp button opens chat with clinic number
Google Maps embed shows clinic location
Phone number is clickable and initiates call on mobile
All contact options are easily accessible

requirements.text: Build backend data model for appointments including patient name, contact info, preferred date/time, service type, and status
acceptanceCriteria: Appointments can be created with patient details
Each appointment has unique ID
Appointments can be queried and filtered
Status field supports pending/confirmed/cancelled states

requirements.text: Create backend clinic status toggle functionality that tracks whether clinic is open, closed, or in emergency mode
acceptanceCriteria: Clinic status can be set to open, closed, or emergency
Status persists across canister upgrades
Status can be queried by frontend
Only authorized users can modify status

requirements.text: Build backend content management system for storing and retrieving photos, reviews, and before-after images with metadata
acceptanceCriteria: Images can be uploaded with descriptions
Reviews can be added with patient name and rating
Before-after pairs are linked together
Content can be retrieved for frontend display

requirements.text: Create backend doctor availability schedule management supporting multiple doctors with time slots and date ranges
acceptanceCriteria: Doctor schedules can be created and updated
Availability includes days, time ranges, and exceptions
Frontend can query available slots for booking
Schedules persist across upgrades

requirements.text: Build admin dashboard page with clinic status toggle displaying real-time banner on public site when status is Emergency or Closed
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard has toggle switch for clinic status
Toggling status immediately updates backend
Public website displays banner when status is Closed or Emergency
Banner is prominent and clearly visible

requirements.text: Create appointment manager interface in admin panel displaying all bookings with filtering by date and status, allowing status updates
acceptanceCriteria: All appointments display in organized table or list
Admin can filter appointments by date range and status
Admin can update appointment status
Display shows patient details and service requested

requirements.text: Build content management interface in admin panel for uploading photos, reviews, and before-after images without requiring code changes
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can upload new images through form interface
Admin can add reviews with patient name and text
Admin can create before-after pairs by uploading two images
Uploaded content immediately appears on public site

requirements.text: Create doctor availability scheduler interface in admin panel allowing modification of doctor schedules with date pickers and time range selectors
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can view current doctor schedules
Admin can add new availability blocks with date and time
Admin can mark doctors as unavailable for specific dates
Changes save to backend immediately

requirements.text: Implement authentication system restricting admin panel access to authorized users only
acceptanceCriteria: Admin panel requires authentication to access
Unauthorized users cannot view or modify admin content
Authentication uses Internet Identity
Authenticated users can access all admin features

requirements.text: Apply minimalist white, deep royal blue, and teal color palette throughout the website creating a boutique, high-end medical-professional aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Primary colors are white, royal blue, and teal
Color scheme is consistent across all pages
Design feels modern, clean, and professional
High contrast for readability

requirements.text: Render all generated images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in public/assets/generated
Images are referenced correctly in components
All images load properly on the website

constraints: Must use Motoko for backend, React with TypeScript for frontend, and Tailwind CSS for styling
All backend logic must remain in a single actor file (backend/main.mo)
Cannot use real-time WebSocket features or external video streaming
Cannot integrate external authentication providers besides Internet Identity
WhatsApp integration must use web.whatsapp.com links, not API calls
Google Maps must use embed iframe, not Maps API
nonGoals: Integration with external medical record systems
